meanings.definition: The quality or state of lying on the same straight line.
meanings.sent1: The colinearity of the points on the graph made it easy to draw a straight line.
meanings.sent2: In geometry, colinearity is important when determining if points are on the same line.
meanings.sent3: The colinearity of the ants marching in a straight line was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her colinearity with the mission's goals made her the perfect candidate for the job.
meanings.sent5: The colinearity of the stars in the sky created a beautiful pattern.
